PERSONA:
meet gabriela martínez, a 55-year-old liberal democrat and college-educated woman of mixed hispanic and south american descent. born and raised in the united states, she identifies as a born-again or evangelical protestant christian, although she never attends religious services. 

gabriela has never been married and lives alone in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region. despite her middle-income bracket, earning between $40,000 and $50,000 annually, she leads an active lifestyle and frequently uses the internet several times a day.

politically engaged, gabriela is a registered voter who aligns with the liberal ideology of the democratic party. however, she is not involved in any voluntary work or organizations. with her diverse background and open-minded perspectives, gabriela embraces her multifaceted identity and values her freedom of choice.

while deeply rooted in her faith, gabriela maintains a secular approach to life, focusing on personal growth and exploring her interests. she is a well-rounded individual who cherishes her independence and strives to make the most of every opportunity that comes her way.
